# Day 11

## Part 1

> How many seats are occupied
> after the seating game?

Lazy solution:

```js
const input = `
L.LL.LL.LL
LLLLLLL.LL
L.L.L..L..
LLLL.LL.LL
L.LL.LL.LL
L.LLLLL.LL
..L.L.....
LLLLLLLLLL
L.LLLLLL.L
L.LLLLL.LL
`.trim()

let previousArrangement = input

const finalSeats = input.split('\n').reduce(reducer, [])
const occupiedSeats = finalSeats.join('').match(/(#)/g).length
console.log(occupiedSeats)

function reducer(newRows, row, y, currentRows) {
  const newRow = [...row].reduce((newSeats, seat, x, currentSeats) => {
    if (seat === '.') {
      return newSeats + seat
    }

    const neighbors = [
      currentRows[y - 1]?.[x - 1],
      currentRows[y - 1]?.[x],
      currentRows[y - 1]?.[x + 1],

      currentSeats[x - 1],
      currentSeats[x + 1],

      currentRows[y + 1]?.[x - 1],
      currentRows[y + 1]?.[x],
      currentRows[y + 1]?.[x + 1],
    ]

    if (seat === 'L' && !neighbors.includes('#')) {
      return newSeats + '#'
    }

    if (seat === '#' && neighbors.filter((n) => n === '#').length >= 4) {
      return newSeats + 'L'
    }

    return newSeats + seat
  }, '')
  newRows.push(newRow)

  if (y !== currentRows.length - 1) {
    return newRows
  }

  const newArrangement = newRows.join('\n')

  // Calm has ensued ðŸ˜Œ
  if (previousArrangement === newArrangement) {
    return newRows
  }

  // Has not!
  previousArrangement = newArrangement

  return newRows.reduce(reducer, [])
}
```

## Part 2

> Play the seating game again,
> but now with slightly different rules.
> How many seats are occupied in the end?

We have to change two things from Part 1.
First, the neighbors can be more far away,
so let's implement a helper function
for getting the next visible seat in each direction:

```js
/* Before: */

const neighbors = [
  currentRows[y - 1]?.[x - 1],
  currentRows[y - 1]?.[x],
  currentRows[y - 1]?.[x + 1],

  currentSeats[x - 1],
  currentSeats[x + 1],

  currentRows[y + 1]?.[x - 1],
  currentRows[y + 1]?.[x],
  currentRows[y + 1]?.[x + 1],
]

/* After: */

// prettier-ignore
const Direction = {
  northWest: { x: -1, y: -1 },
  north:     { x:  0, y: -1 },
  northEast: { x: +1, y: -1 },
  west:      { x: -1, y:  0 },
  east:      { x: +1, y:  0 },
  southWest: { x: -1, y: +1 },
  south:     { x:  0, y: +1 },
  southEast: { x: +1, y: +1 },
}

const neighbors = Object.values(Direction).map((direction) =>
  getNextVisibleSeat(currentRows, x, y, direction)
)

function getNextVisibleSeat(currentRows, x, y, direction) {
  const seat = currentRows[y + direction.y]?.[x + direction.x]
  return !seat || seat === 'L' || seat === '#'
    ? seat
    : getNextVisibleSeat(
        currentRows,
        x + direction.x,
        y + direction.y,
        direction
      )
}
```

And second,
we need to change this condition:

```diff
-if (seat === '#' && neighbors.filter((n) => n === '#').length >= 4) {
+if (seat === '#' && neighbors.filter((n) => n === '#').length >= 5) {
   return newSeats + 'L'
 }
```

[_flems_](https://flems.io/#0=N4IgtglgJlA2CmIBcBGADGgNCAzvBAxgC7xTK4D2sArkRBQHYB0AVjiNgGYQLtIDaoBgEMwiJCAgMADrVbtsBRiQZFyShjiIACKbJ0BebQAMAOgwAyV602t37th-ecXHLu2-denLz-fPOfr7BHj7eXkHhUaEWAVGRgWHRyYnBQY5BceF+CRHenpG57gm5WVZMRSkhqeXVta7JGV5l9TY5dQ0dVTUxaU4tnb22hUmDSeklxY3W5pWDw92to10Lcw2llsvtgUUVXT29YQUJsxVn5+VnrhnDF1d35497N7eP65erz-fXe5cD6ct5mNgVU1jd9jNNtlAW4FtEChDJvDITkmtcbFNDiD9mssdEAgilnjgbijhjEcjIQcUnCIZTQkjqVTASzRozsQD2cSrKdUW9wb8ruj+V9Yes7j9PhdheLam9XAMnGLMXk6qSQXDSf8DiMsWDydjDb94jyoQbVWzFiTDRbWS1BRyOrrbVbaXazUTrdTCT11aCbQS8dtLdyfZ0--56d6iQAcmUlhQa4I2A5dk2TJeRITiqEvhFxLHAJQHLr24WLPeQIpUa1kZRZMUxcFH6pIB7aerl4mKaV6ZqTatUqdlrVWvWp5JZFWHQa1eFNKRIV7vmn65iFPmyjKBEkWeh6ZaFrECWMtncZt2LtdFVUxMp-opkuO1DANHUaqhFVmoFcxojVImDt0e1DaFGEsvl4a-uhNVfQVkklVSlaeVRLyCt5lGFrmhGgyDkNtJVh3vpBgmxS4alPgpHVIddI2vTqXU8ThZkHfOAXqbG2PjGjn2FXqTULiTunwc+gbnhR8WvAW3kLf1y3g7u0pC1Nq2o+SxkmRJaXBkjjN1VldMA2habM-kIyk09NJ4WtKNkxSyX2adx0bT1xPoz9NOPQySkGzePX2gipvU-OF2jkbl1Mg972a+LbP6fugdzRWS1+fDIdkd9sLlst1zybsD7Qkx3V2+6isIar4YGVxW0645ifdXOdsGeueeldnLvYYBI301M8uU3022deTxv527BetLjNce0VdKua7+vDSdv2CQnvc2sJBKavK0OlrW8NMaiC2+dHY0z48BPNTNx0hBXQ8Y63hkMRlWsW-4Hoy1jm3J7jJ--zhCAued84QfyAU4FYBQKQMKEVMDADSggZi8ECLwQAYgIQIuRiKEB3PMSoolVB4BMFgBQOReCSVkopVSplBLzCcGoB8zhNTMVoqwXghg8A8kACUKB5JwG4rBFqKluLJdc+AqhzWWoIXYvxnzjEmpdc8-gZwbV5NxUi0gWK8FGpNdSwFbi8A0rcQ4t1BgAB87rxlGIgJwbQeCY2GAMEYaFTAEUpsadoMRRBqBYJqcavJkagVpImQCvxRjdkMEbdoT1xr5FmIAEZKKBUYAA8l2lg5CiBMGOQy6g1i8GaO0bqxFXLpBhqgFokdlCE2JtbUY+5RAABy8AHFEAAGoQBwBALtCBI14IdWI51FqrWOLtdoZds612to1am3QGas0Ar0bm7Q0KLDQu0AAMmA9oAAhB2uR3be1MCkAQGgUAp3QoFQit1BiP1GNLeWytEamUtP-ah1tzbW3pszdm39ebUMgbA1BmDWDmXcFgCQQ1Rr13GMo4Rjl4q5HmO0ImowABWdDm6S3iJw166t+G60AdhR+kjH7sMVskzWgj2a-FMP-Qi2J3q71MFkDgXlVaXXvrTV+9xEG-3XqdUQF1zKeN8ekdoFAInFPieU8Zu9Gn3lGPbSaq5Ny7kPJs88zzlqWVsthfC0z2ghHaAAMIMrANoMxSTtBOpwJOqA2hAC8G4AGD2-FkbwUc05PTLnXNufcx5OajBVoC5V4LqhXMlKU7hs1XnxkKaMXFgAEmlxRRBwN+JK2c8rgWqshdq-5irQXqs+bE2Wjzunwv6vRatrBOL8XmAU1qnVlDtDbr3Qe49p7z3wEvdZ29lq42PufauxgzW21Ep0BRowl3bN3v4BZutd2dHMHcbigA-EwfgDiCO-d1UwBxuK-GtYgxRgAPgj+tNLOOye0EjlHNWuOtsB1j1ttjDv7qPSes9F6AV4NE758tN6PvXap448HK6-tQ5iZh4J32n3M8h+4tnxajEQ8oaJglzaeEUDABShAWDkAMGoLAWA2A8CEF1XwEAKAABsSAABM6vGG4oYUAA)

## What did I learn?

Nothing,
not even after refactoring Part 2,
which initially had this _:sparkles: beautiful :sparkles:_ solution:

```js
const neighbors = [
  getUpperLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getUpperSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getUpperRightSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getRightSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getLowerLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getLowerSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getLowerRightSeat(currentRows, i, j),
]

// ...

function getUpperLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i--, j--; i >= 0 && j >= 0; i--, j--) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getUpperSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i--; i >= 0; i--) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getUpperRightSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i--, j++; i >= 0 && j < currentRows[0].length; i--, j++) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (j--; j >= 0; j--) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getRightSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (j++; j < currentRows[0].length; j++) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getLowerLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i++, j--; i < currentRows.length && j >= 0; i++, j--) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getLowerSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i++; i < currentRows.length; i++) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getLowerRightSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (
    i++, j++;
    i < currentRows.length && j < currentRows[0].length;
    i++, j++
  ) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}
```

I'm still so proud. :rofl:

because I know you want to!
